title: Ticket #5874: condor_q -batch should show completed and total for non-dag jobs
description:
The SCHEDD should insert an attribute into the cluster ad that records the number of procs in the cluster. condor_q -batch can then use that attribute to display correct values for Total and Completed columns for non-dag jobs.

The new immutable attribute, TotalSubmitProcs will be injected into the cluster ad by the schedd when the transaction is committed. It will contain the number of unique proc-ids included for that cluster.
